title: 大阪名古自駕遊 Pass 一問

replies.msg:
想問下如果我會去大阪名古屋北陸10天自駕
但租車公司方面話如果租pass 就一定要跟返租車日數去租

名古屋北陸 計盡最盡淨係Stay到6日
咁即係會蝕左四日

想問下如果我呢個情況 租10日CEP+NEP Pass
會唔會貴過就咁用ETC
定係會唔會有其他地方可以淨係買到6日嘅Pass

感謝🙏🏻

好老實
你俾我嘅話會分開租車
中間transit搭車算
係咪會蝕好多
你景點係咩........因為CEP 都去到京都~~如果你頭幾日都係大阪周邊大路景點.....不如坐鐵玩左先仲方便, 到京都再租車上中部北陸只用CEP 仲化算

多謝咁多位巴絲意見
我比較想知
如果照按我嘅計劃計算
係咪真係會蝕好多
定其實差不多

補充番先

我係大阪關西機場租還


個行程係:
一到關西就直去名古屋>白川>高山>富山>金澤>滋賀>京都>宇治>大阪>關西


我都有諗過租6日 然後4日搭車
但因為帶住兩老所以唔係咁方便


所以想問下 我應唔應該租pass 好
自己計下你行highway要幾多錢咪知囉

I think it’s fine. Don’t worry. It’s a good bet that the Japanese yen 💴 will continue falling so you may as well go on a trip to Osaka this summer. The sun has been dazzlingly bright there. You might just as well go for an outdoor onsen soaking up the sun (by the way I’ve just got out of an onsen and am drying myself on a towel)I enjoy going to the annual winter carnival 🎡 and going on the thrill rides and eating pancakes 🥞 and sushi 🍣 soaking up the nice Christmassy atmosphere. Several years ago I saw X japan live in Osaka Dome Stadium 🏟 which was absolutely incredible and unforgettable. They’ve been strutting their stuff since they were young. Even though they’re past their prime they’re still excellent musicians so don’t sell them short ! At the end of the last encore, they bowed onstage soaking up the applause 👏🏻 They were given a thunderous standing ovation. The drummer took part in a three thousand metre race a few years ago where he came first. He rose to the challenge, ran for all he was worth and dived over the finish line 🏁 passing the runner 🏃🏻‍♀️ who was ahead of him earlier. Hundreds of people congratulated him on winning the race as he held the trophy 🏆 up. The race was the opportunity for all the world’s best runners to strut their stuff. It was truly memorable. I work at Hotel JAP Osaka. My friend Alex received a commission for a sculpture from the hotel 🏨 I congratulated him on having been commissioned to make a sculpture for the hotel because it’s a once in a lifetime opportunity. Another friend of mine who works for the hotel was assigned to the company’s branch in Hokkaido with which he is really pleased. I too am pleased about his promotion. Feel free to come to our hotel 🏨 and say hi. 😊
